modName: The Evil Mansion - Final Edition Recall Spell
summary: Added a teleport spell to quickly get to the Mansion and back.
descriptionHtml:
Author:
    Squall
    
Description:
    Added teleport spell "Mansion Recall" to get to the mansion quickly and back to where you were.
    You can learn this spell by reading a book and this book is in the changing room (behind doors requiring a special key) on the table.
    No other changes were made.
    
Requirements:
    The Evil Mansion
    
Installation:
    Make a backup of the "TheEvilMansionFE.esp" file.
    Extract content to your gamedir.
    
Unstallation:
    Be sure to unequip spell!
    Restore original "TheEvilMansionFE.esp" file.
    Delete gamedir/Data/Scripts/EvilMansionRecallSCR.pex
    Delete gamedir/Data/Scripts/Source/EvilMansionRecallSCR.psc

The Evil Mansion Author:
    JP'TR

Link:
    http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47795/?
author: Squall

files.name: The Evil Mansion - Final Edition Recall Spell
